name: Repentance
description:
They followed the light, passed the land of temptation, and finally here they are. The man and the woman are inside the cave right underneath the mountain that they saw earlier. This light used to be the bridge that connected earth and sky, as been told before, the genies used to use this path. But right now, nobody can enters the sky but the angels, the path is closed now.

The woman can't help herself but to repent, she fell on her knees and then tears come out way more than she can hold. She really feels guilty to The Mighty Creator on the thing she did in the past. The man can do nothing but to try to calm her, he get down on his knee and also repent and pray to The Mighty Creator.

At the end, they got what they deserve and never turn themself from The Mighty Creator.
